newsitem.title: SPAIN: Barcelona airport expansion plan ready by summer.
newsitem.headline: Barcelona airport expansion plan ready by summer.

text.p: Spanish Development Minister Rafael Arias Salgado said on Friday a plan to expand the Barcelona airport by building a third runway would be ready by the summer.

"Before summer the plan for the expansion of the Barcelona airport will be ready so that we can go ahead and start...construction of the third runway," Arias Salgado told a news conference following the weekly cabinet meeting.
Arias Salgado said there were still environmental issues to be worked out and that because of space constraints the third runway would be the final expansion of this airport.
